title: SimplyHired Jobs Scraper - HTTP Optimized
description: High-performance job scraper for SimplyHired.com using HTTP-based scraping. Search by keywords/location or provide direct URLs. Extracts comprehensive job data including descriptions, salary, company info, and more.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of SimplyHired search URLs to scrape. If provided, these will be used instead of keyword/location search.

keywords.title: Keywords (if not using Start URLs)
keywords.description: Job search keywords. Use commas to search multiple terms (e.g., 'software engineer, data scientist, product manager').

location.title: Location (if not using Start URLs)
location.description: Geographic location for job search (e.g., 'New York, NY', 'San Francisco', 'Remote').

remote_only.title: Remote jobs only
remote_only.description: Search for remote jobs only. This will override the location field.

results_wanted.title: Maximum jobs to scrape
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect. Higher numbers take longer but provide more data.

maxPagesPerList.title: Maximum pages per search
maxPagesPerList.description: Safety limit on the number of pagination pages to visit per search query.

maxConcurrency.title: Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Number of parallel requests. Higher = faster. Recommended: 10-20 for speed, 5-8 for maximum stealth.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings. RESIDENTIAL proxies recommended for best results and to avoid blocking.
